title: Apple Is Back Online After Several Services Including App Store, iTunes, Podcasts Suffer Outage
sub_head: More than 20 services went offline at one point on Monday, according to tech company’s system status page
body:
Apple Inc. services were back online Monday after an outage earlier in the day disrupted access for users and businesses.
More than 20 services went offline at one point on Monday, including the App Store, Apple Music, Apple TV+, the iTunes store, Apple Maps and Podcasts, according to the company’s system status page. It said the outages began at 12:32 p.m. ET.
